text: Adam Thomas (born 11 August 1988) is an English actor. He is best known for portraying the roles of Donte Charles in the BBC school-based drama series Waterloo Road (2006–2009, 2023–present), and Adam Barton in the ITV soap opera Emmerdale (2009–2018). ==Early life== Born and raised in Salford, Thomas is of British, Indian and Caribbean heritage. ==Other websites== Category:1988 births Category:Living people Category:English child actors Category:English television actors Category:Actors from Greater Manchester
title: Adam Thomas
